特征-魔鬼猪猡: 餐桌礼仪极差，挥舞着鸡腿手舞足蹈 Atrocious table manners, gesticulating wildly with chicken leg
深陷在圆润脸庞中的小眼睛，却有着奇异的吸引力 Beady eyes deep-set in a plump face but oddly compelling
从衣领中探出的项链，形似人类的牙齿 Peeking out from collar, a necklace looks like Huma n teeth
大腹便便，体态臃肿，双眼布满血丝，泪眼朦胧 Pot-bellied and portly, with rheumy, bloodshot eyes
不停地奔跑，圆脸上翘起的鼻子格外显眼 Constantly running, turned up nose centered in a round face
肥胖手指上戴着珍贵的戒指，因挤压而显得鼓胀 Precious rings on fat fingers, squeezing and bulging
肥胖的腹部因持续不断的喘息笑声而颤动 Corpulent belly quakes with incessant, wheezing laughter
尖锐如针的牙齿与细长咧笑的嘴唇 Sharp, needle like teeth and narrow, grinning lips
容易数不清那堆叠的下巴数量 Easy to lose count of the number of bulging chins
令人不安的眉毛缺失/半透明皮肤 Somewhat unsettling lack of eyebrows/semi-translucent skin
油腻的细发在波动的下巴上分散了注意力 Greasy, fine hair distracts on a rippling chin
巨大的宽鼻上布满了蛛网般的毛细血管 Spidery capillaries adorn an extremely large and wide nose
体型惊人，不禁让人为制带匠感到惋惜 Incredible girth, one can't help but feel sorry for belt-maker
兴奋地尖叫着，同时倒出一杯浓郁的红葡萄酒 Squealing excitedly while pouring a goblet of rich, red Claret
每说一句话，下颚的垂肉便随之颤动舞动 Jowls that jiggle and dance with every word
浑身散发着过量香水的刺鼻气味，勉强掩盖着浓重的体臭 Stinking of over-applied perfumes, barely masks bad body odor
喧闹不止，伴随着狂笑和咯咯笑声，间或响起响亮的鼻息声 Noisy, guffaws and chortles, punctuated with loud snorts
粗短四肢，穿着异常小巧且尖头十足的鞋子 Stubby, short limbs with unnaturally tiny, very pointy shoes
曾经精致的衣物，如今布满了可疑的污渍 Once fine clothing, covered in questionable stains
肿胀却灵巧的双手，悬挂在摇摆晃动的粗壮手臂末端 Swollen but nimble hands at the end of bulgy, joggling arms
